00028 #include "ramp.h"

00030 #include <string>

00032 
00033 
00034 namespace pwiz {
00035 namespace msdata {
00036 
00037 
00038 /// adapter to provide RAMP-friendly access to MSData library 
00039 class RAMPAdapter 
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     /// constructor
00044     RAMPAdapter(const std::string& filename);
00045 
00046     /// returns the number of scans stored in the data file
00047     size_t scanCount() const;
00048     
00049     /// converts a scan number to a 0-based index; 
00050     /// returns scanCount() if scanNumber is not found
00051     size_t index(int scanNumber) const;
00052 
00053     /// fills in RAMP ScanHeaderStruct for a specified scan
00054     void getScanHeader(size_t index, ScanHeaderStruct& result) const;
00055 
00056     /// fills in m/z-intensity pair array for a specified scan 
00057     void getScanPeaks(size_t index, std::vector<double>& result) const;
00058 
00059     /// fills in RAMP RunHeaderStruct 
00060     void getRunHeader(RunHeaderStruct& result) const;
00061 
00062     /// fills in RAMP InstrumentHeaderStruct
00063     void getInstrument(InstrumentStruct& result) const;
00064 
00065     private:
00066     class Impl; 
00067     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00068     RAMPAdapter(RAMPAdapter& that);
00069     RAMPAdapter& operator=(RAMPAdapter& that);
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 } // namespace msdata
00074 } // namespace pwiz
